control.name: spEditItemCount
control.description: Sets the number of rating items within the editor and thus, the editor maximum rating.

control.name: cmbEditRatingOrientation
control.description: Allows you to arrange rating items either horizontally or vertically.

control.name: cmbEditFillPrecision
control.description: Specifies an available fill degree for rating items within this RatingControl. Depending on this value, the editor can have fractional ratings.

control.name: popupContainerEditImages
control.description: Allows you to replace the built-in images for regular, hovered and checked rating items with your own custom glyphs.

control.name: chEditShowText
control.description: Displays or hides the editor text.

control.name: cmbEditTextLocation
control.description: Aligns rating items within the editor.

control.name: spEditIndent
control.description: Specifies the distance between the RatingControl rating items and this control text.

control.name: chEditHtmlDraw
control.description: Enables or disables formatting of the editor text via HTML tags.

control.name: cmbEditRatingDirection
control.description: By default ratings are arranged from left to right (horizontal orientation) and from bottom to top (vertical orientation). This combo allows you to reverse this default alignment.
